mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_note ( room_no , user_no , partner_no , note_subject , note_content , regist_date , use_at ) VALUES ( #{roomNo} , 3 , ( SELECT partner_no FROM tbl_room WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} ) , #{noteVO.noteSubject} , #{noteVO.noteContent} , NOW() , 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT tbl_note.*, tbl_user.user_name, tbl_partner.comp_name FROM tbl_note JOIN tbl_user ON (tbl_note.user_no = tbl_user.user_no) JOIN tbl_partner ON (tbl_note.partner_no = tbl_partner.partner_no) WHERE tbl_note.use_at = 'Y' AND tbl_note.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY regist_date DESC
SELECT tbl_note.*, tbl_user.user_name FROM tbl_note JOIN tbl_user ON (tbl_note.user_no = tbl_user.user_no ) WHERE tbl_note.use_at = 'Y' ORDER BY tbl_note.regist_date DESC

SELECT tbl_partner.comp_name , tbl_note.room_no , note_subject , note_text1 , note_text2 , note_text3 , note_content , tbl_note.regist_date FROM tbl_note JOIN tbl_user ON (tbl_user.user_no = tbl_note.user_no) JOIN tbl_partner ON (tbl_note.partner_no = tbl_partner.partner_no) WHERE tbl_note.user_no = #{userNo} AND tbl_note.note_no = #{noteNo}

SELECT tbl_user.user_name , tbl_note.room_no , note_subject , note_text1 , note_text2 , note_text3 , note_content , tbl_note.regist_date FROM tbl_note JOIN tbl_user ON (tbl_user.user_no = tbl_note.user_no) WHERE tbl_note.note_no = #{noteNo}
